text.en: You can discard this card; add 1 "Apodrakosis Ascension Gate of Serpentfall" from your Deck to your hand. During your Main Phase, if 2 or more monsters other than "Yuanba, Abyssal Apodrakosis of Serpentfall" were sent from the hand and/or Deck to the GY this turn: You can Special Summon this card from your GY. You can place 1 face-up "Apodrakosis Ascension Gate of Serpentfall" you control on the bottom of the Deck; banish your opponent's entire hand, and if you do, they draw the same number of cards. You can only use each effect of "Yuanba, Abyssal Apodrakosis of Serpentfall" once per turn.
